text: Izak Cornelis Bergh (born 13 May 1993) is a South African first-class cricketer. He is right-handed batsman and a right-arm Legbreak bowler. He made his First Class debut for Gauteng against Eastern Province. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:South African cricketers Category:Gauteng cricketers
title: Izak Cornelis Bergh
